parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the SAP HANA instance.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The security identifier (SID) of the SAP HANA database. You must specify a valid SID. The SID must be three characters in length and start with a letter. For more information, see [How to find sid user and instance number of HANA db?](https://answers.sap.com/questions/555192/how-to-find-sid-user-and-instance-number-of-hana-d.html?)

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault.
